description:
Get ready to race. This boot has a precise fit and legendary power transfer. It's Salomon’s highest end performance classic boot.

  • Thermo-molded heel for stability and comfort
  • Quicklace system for easy entry with a secure fit
  • Racing outsoles offer abrasion resistance and optimum flex
  • Full gaiters keep your feet warm and dry
name: Salomon RC7 Nocturne Prolink Classic Boots - Unisex
